text: With a message to keep the surroundings clean and green, about 20,000 participants are expected to join a walk, ‘Green Walkathon’ under the aegis of Dhan Foundation on February 13. It will be taken out from Teppakulam and reach Gandhi Museum where a slew of events have been lined up. Various non-governmental organisations, service organisations, public sector undertakings and volunteers, including students. For more details, aspirants can get in touch with Dhan Foundation coordinators at 93646 43432 or 94439 25261.
title: Green Walkathon
